text: Complications of blood transfusions Acute (within 24 hours) Early (within 2 weeks) Late (after 2 weeks) Acute haemolytic reactions Delayed haemolytic reactions Transmission of infection Allergic reactions Posttransfusion purpura Transfusion-associated graft-versus-host Bacterial contamination of blood unit Transfusion induced immunomodulation disease Febrile non-haemolytic reactions Transfusional iron overload Transfusion-related acute lung injury Alloimmunization Transfusion-assodated circulatory overload Transfusion induced immunomodulation Delays in transfusion leading to under resuscitation
